summary.summary: Seasoned IT professional with 19+ years of experience in information technology, specializing in project and product management, techno-functional management, and data science. Proven track record in translating business needs into technology requirements and managing all phases of IT projects, from needs analysis to implementation and training. Expertise in agile management, AWS cloud computing, and data science algorithms.

responsibilities: Led two project teams consisting of 40+ resources, managing payment product enhancement for MasterCard (UK)
Managed fixed-bid project, ensuring delivery of a specific number of story points per iteration
Coordinated with interdepartmental teams (DevOps, product, infrastructure, performance) to optimize task management
Identified and mitigated project risks, updating the client regularly
Implemented quality initiatives for the entire Consumer App project portfolio

experiences.company: HSBC Software Development India Pvt. Ltd.
responsibilities: Led significant projects under Staff Transformation Program, including AWS cloud migration and DevOps implementation
Managed end-to-end project lifecycle for re-engineering of banking applications using microservice architecture
Implemented agile scrum ceremonies (Scrum of Scrum) to enhance project visibility and collaboration
Drove performance and quality improvements, managing vendor resources from Wipro, Infosys, and Cap Gemini
Effectively communicated project status and risks to senior management and clients

experiences.company: HSBC Software Development India Pvt. Ltd.
responsibilities: Managed the HFE Enhancement project, overseeing all aspects including planning, execution, and implementation
Developed HLD and LLD, provided work breakdowns, and assigned tasks to project team members
Defined and implemented quality targets, achieving a high Sonar quality index for the team

experiences.company: HSBC Software Development India Pvt. Ltd.
